materials.raw_text: Ac: 40 g, Bi: 80 g, Li: 20 g, Binder (e.g., epoxy resin): 60 g, Hardener: 10 g

sourcing.instructions: Ac (Aluminum chloride) - chemical supply stores; Bi (Bismuth) - metal suppliers; Li (Lithium) - chemical supply stores; Binder - craft stores or online; Hardener - craft stores or online.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 40 g of Ac, 80 g of Bi, and 20 g of Li using a digital scale. 
 2. Mix the Ac, Bi, and Li in a clean glass or ceramic container until uniformly combined. 
 3. In a separate container, measure 60 g of binder and 10 g of hardener. 
 4. Combine the binder and hardener, mixing thoroughly to ensure a homogeneous mixture. 
 5. Gradually add the metal mixture to the binder mixture, stirring continuously to avoid lumps.
